lines.text:
[Henderson is about to crash his car into the police car]
Ah shit!

[his only line in the movie]
You?
Tell me one thing. It was him, wasn't it? The redhead.
You were sure, weren't you? Right from the beginning. You were sure it was Henderson.
Alright, I was sure. Of course I was sure. There's nothing wrong with my eyes.
Bastard! Grab him! He stabbed my wife. Get him!
